item.description:
Life in the modern world can be a juggling act of your time and resources. Moving gracefully through the day and managing all the responsibilities and unplanned situations that often arise are very challenging. This seminar will address how to fit a fulfilling spiritual practice into your already busy schedule, in order to bring peace and joy to all aspects of your life.

Suggested Donation: $25 (Bring a Friend for Free)

Father Peter Bowes is an ordained Priest and Master Teacher in the Order of Christ/Sophia. In 1999, he co-founded the Order of Christ/Sophia and began the Centers of Light with Mother Clare Watts, who is also a Priest and Master Teacher in the Order.
Father Peter, aside from being a Master Teacher, has also been called an “Internet Guru” for his growing online presence in social media avenues such as YouTube, Facebook, and Twitter. His teachings are also available via podcasts on AskFatherPeter.com and on his blog, The Mystical Path, which has gained a loyal following.

Every week of the year, Father Peter travels nationally to give lectures and seminars on the Christian mystical inner path. Also an author, he has written and published several books, entitled The Word Within, The Radical Path, and Spiritual Astrology. Currently, he devotes his time to teaching and writing lectures and songs.
A prolific musician and songwriter, Father Peter now has eleven albums on the market (visit www.SophiaRadio.com to hear Father Peter's music).

Father Peter received his Masters and Doctoral degrees from Indiana University in Educational Psychology and practiced psychology for many years. He has two grown daughters and lives in Chicago.

Follow him on twitter at FatherPeter.
item.name: Fitting Spirituality into a Hectic Schedule with Father Peter Bowes
